additional_information: reaction_condition: reaction_temperature:room temperature (not explicitly stated);    reaction_ph:6.5;    reaction_other_conditions:whole cell KdcA mutants (OD 600 = 50);     FcMeOH (1.5 equiv);     10 v/v% DMSO;     2.5 mM Mg2+;     total volume 2 mL;     0.4 mA constant current;     5.0 F mol−1 electricity;     graphite electrodes;     undivided cell;     carried out in a glove box (anaerobic);     magnetic stir bar;     stirred at 760 rpm;    reaction_substrate_concentration:5 mM
